amendment.description: Amendment increases the amount available to the Corps of Engineers by $20,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section to the bill increasing funds in the bill for CORPS OF ENGINEERS--CIVIL--OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE by $20 million. The increase would be offset by a similar reduction in funds from the DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY--DEPARTMENTAL ADMINISTRATION account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jones (NC) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 275 (Roll no. 208).
